Name Rascal/Libraries/LabeledGraph/reachR

Function set[&T] reachR(LGraph[&T] G, set[&T] Start, set[&T] Restr)
Description Returns the set of nodes in LabeledGraph G that are reachable from any of the nodes in set Start using path that only use nodes in the set Restr.
Examples 
rascal>import LabeledGraph;
ok
rascal>reachR({<1,"A",2>, <1,"B",3>, <2,"C",4>, <3,"D",4>}, {1}, {1, 2, 3});
set[int]: {3,2}
